title: Protection from Poison
content:
Ranger Paladin Life Domain (Cleric Subclass) Trickery Domain (Cleric Subclass) Circle of the Moon (Druid Subclass) Circle of the Land (Druid Subclass) Circle of Spores (Druid Subclass)

Protection from Poison can be cast by using the following Items:

Scroll of Protection from Poison

Protection from Poison Tips & Notes

For any non-summon spell that lasts until Long Rest, the caster does not need to be in your party once you leave camp as long as the spell does not require concentration. Theref
